title: Auntie's Snitch
text: Auntie's Snitch can't block.Prowl  (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Goblin or Rogue.)Whenever a Goblin or Rogue you control deals combat damage to a player, if Auntie's Snitch is in your graveyard, you may return Auntie's Snitch to your hand.
